name: Box-Cox
description: The Box-Cox transformation was developed for transforming the response variable,values must be non-zero and positive

name: YeoJohnson
description: Similar to the Box-Cox model but can accommodate predictors with zero and/or negativevalues

name: center
description: Subtracts the mean of the predictor's data (again from the data inx) from thepredictor values

name: scale
description: Calculates the standard deviation for an attribute and divides each value by that standard deviation

name: range
description: Scales the data to be within [0, 1].

name: knnImpute
description: Using the most similar (nearest) neighbors to impute the missing values using the average value of its neighbors for that column

name: pca
description: Transform the data to the principal components. The transform keeps components above the variance threshold (default=0.95) or the number of components can be specified (pcaComp).

name: ica
description: Transform the data to the independent components. Unlike PCA, ICA retains those components that are independent.

name: spatialSign
description: Project data onto a unit circle.

name: corr
description: Seeking to filter out highly correlated predictors

name: zv
description: Remove attributes with a zero variance (all the same value).

name: nzv
description: Remove attributes with a near zero variance (close to the same value).

name: conditionalX
description: Examines the distribution of each predictor conditional on the outcome. If there is only one unique value within any class, the predictor is excludedfrom further calculations.
